meanings.definition: A collection of sacred texts in Christianity.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed many bibles for everyone to read.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in reading her favorite bible every night.
meanings.sent3: The bibles on the shelf seemed to whisper ancient wisdom.
meanings.sent4: Her love for bibles was like a flame that never dimmed.
meanings.sent5: The bibles held stories that touched her heart deeply.

meanings.definition: A book regarded as authoritative in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the world of cooking, that cookbook is considered the bible.
meanings.sent2: He always carries his programming bible with him to work.
meanings.sent3: The gardening bible helped her grow the most beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent4: To him, the dictionary was the bible of language.
meanings.sent5: The fashion bible guided her choices in clothing.

meanings.definition: A copy of the Christian scriptures.
meanings.sent1: She gifted her friend a beautifully bound bible for Christmas.
meanings.sent2: He read the bible every morning to start his day with faith.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot squawked lines from the bible all day.
meanings.sent4: The old bible passed down through generations held cherished memories.
meanings.sent5: The worn bible pages felt like a connection to the past.
